alert.note: Alert for Dragoon, Mule, Huachuca and Santa Rita Mountains including Bisbee, Canelo Hills, Madera Canyon (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 13 at 3:33AM MST until February 13 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Periods of snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches from 5,000 to 7,000 ft and up to 11 inches above 7,000 ft. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. A second storm Tuesday night into Wednesday will bring some snow, however amounts will be much lighter and generally less than 5 inches. Winds will be much stronger with gusts as high as 70 mph Tuesday night. * WHERE...Dragoon, Mule, Huachuca and Santa Rita Mountains. * WHEN...From 5 AM to 11 PM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Dragoon, Mule, Huachuca and Santa Rita Mountains including Bisbee, Canelo Hills, Madera Canyon
